issue.title: [Rust] [Flight] Support sending FlightData for Dictionaries with that of a RecordBatch
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10801](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10801). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently when converting a `RecordBatch` to `FlightData`, no `FlightData` is generated for the dictionaries, even though as of ARROW-10268 dictionaries are now supported with the IPC writers.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10801?focusedCommentId=17248474) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8826
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8826>
